SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
ANALYTICS
Revenue Management Components

Use the Revenue Management components to get performance insights to build better pipelines, improve forecast accuracy, and generate more revenue. They include Revenue Tracker, Top Open Opportunities chart, Opportunity Conversion chart, Pipeline Forecast Changes chart, and Opportunities by Product and Opportunity Stage chart.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Developer Edition and for an extra cost in Enterprise, Performance, and Unlimited Editions.
Revenue Management Overview

The Revenue Management components contain these charts:

Revenue Tracker: Use this chart in places where you want a quick view of your team's progress based on revenue.
Top Open Opportunities: Quickly identify the top open opportunities. Use this chart to know where to focus your resources.
Opportunity Conversion: Get a quick view of the potential value of opportunities for each product and the corresponding conversion rate.
Pipeline Forecast Changes: View the forecasts and recent changes to projections. Use the chart to understand the changes and adjustments made in the forecasted revenue pipeline.
Product Penetration: Identify the value of opportunities by each product for a profile.
Key Performance Indicators in the Revenue Tracker

This table shows the key performance indicators in the Revenue Tracker chart.

METRIC	DESCRIPTION	CALCULATION
Total Sales	Total won opportunities for the selected date range.	Sum of all Closed Won Opportunities
Win Rate	Total won opportunity percentage from all opportunities closed in the selected date range.	Total Number of Closed Won Opportunities / [Total Number of Closed Won + Total Number of Closed Lost] Opportunities
Avg Deal Amount	Average won opportunity amount from all opportunities closed in the selected period.	Total Amount of all Closed Won Opportunities / [Total Count / Number of Opportunities]
Key Performance Indicators in the Top Open Opportunities Chart

This table shows the key performance indicators in the Top Open Opportunities chart.

METRIC	DESCRIPTION	CALCULATION
Open Opportunities	Total open opportunities in the selected date range.	Sum of all open opportunities
Value of Opportunities	Value of each opportunity.	Value of each opportunity.
Key Performance Indicators in the Opportunity to Focus Chart

This table shows the key performance indicators in the Opportunity to Focus chart:

METRIC	DESCRIPTION	CALCULATION


No Activity

	

This metric can be one of two measures. No recent activity (Open opportunities with no activity in the last fourteen days), or No upcoming activity (Open opportunities with no activities scheduled in the future from today.)

	

No Recent Activity: Count of open opportunities with no activity in the last fourteen days.

No Upcoming Activity: Count of open opportunities with no activities scheduled in the future from today.




No Next Step

	

Open Opportunities where the Next Step field is blank.

	

Sum of all Open Opportunities where the Next Step field is blank.

NOTE No Next Step view is available only for standard opportunity selection.
Key Performance Indicators in the Opportunity Conversion Chart

This table shows the key performance indicators in the Opportunity Conversion chart:

METRIC	DESCRIPTION	CALCULATION


Conversion Rate

	

The ratio of converted opportunities to the total opportunities

	

Total Wins / Total Opportunities Closed grouped by product. Use opportunities in the last 365 days.




Avg Potential Value

	

The average value of opportunity by product.

	

Avg of Opportunity Amount field by Product




Open Opportunities

	

Total Open Opportunities

	

Sum of all Open Opportunities




Closed Won Opportunities

	

Total won opportunities closed in the selected date range.

	

Sum of all Closed Won Opportunities




Closed Lost Opportunities

	

Total lost opportunities closed in the selected date range.

	

Sum of all Closed Lost Opportunities




Projected Value

	

Sum of Potential Value of all closed opportunities within the selected duration.

	

Potential Value of All Closed Opportunities + [(Avg Potential Value per Day * Number of days remaining)]

Key Performance Indicators in the Pipeline Forecast Changes Chart

This table shows the key performance indicators in the Pipeline Forecast Changes chart:

METRIC	DESCRIPTION	CALCULATION


Adjusted Opportunities

	

Opportunities with a change in amount compared to the forecasted value.

	

Opportunities with a change in an amount from OpportunityHistory object.

Filter all the records added into Opportunity History based on the selected duration.

IsClosed = False




New Opportunities

	

All the opportunities created in the selected duration from the date filter.

	

Sum of all the opportunities created in the selected duration from the date filter.


Opportunities Carried Over to Next Period	Opportunities initially planned to close in this period but moved to the next period.	Sum of all opportunities initially planned to close in this period but moved to the next period.


Opportunities Not Closed

	

Opportunities that have crossed their closing date but the stage isn’t closed.

	

Opportunities that have crossed their closing date but the stage isn’t closed.

Key Performance Indicators in the Opportunities by Product and Opportunity Stage Chart

This table shows the key performance indicators in the Opportunities by Product and Opportunity Stage chart:

METRIC	DESCRIPTION	CALCULATION


Opportunity Stage

	

Indicates the Opportunity status, for example, Closed/Won.

	

The potential value and Count of Opportunities.




Value Type

	

Indicates how to display the value of the opportunity.

	Indicates how to display the value of the opportunity.
Key Performance Indicators in the Percentage of Opportunities by Product and Opportunity Stage Chart

This table shows the key performance indicators in the Percentage of Opportunities by Product and Opportunity Stage chart:

METRIC	DESCRIPTION	CALCULATION


Opportunity Stage

	

Indicates the Opportunity status, for example, Closed/Won.

	

The potential value and Count of Opportunities in percentage.




Value Type

	

Indicates how to display the value of the opportunity.

	Indicates how to display the value of the opportunity.
Key Performance Indicators in the Leaderboard Chart

This table shows the key performance indicators in the Leaderboard chart:

METRIC	DESCRIPTION	CALCULATION
Total AUM	

Summary of the assets under management

	

Sum of AUM from the Account object for non-household account records.


Total Deposit	

Indicates the total value of deposits of your clients.

	Indicates the total value of deposits of your clients.
No of Financial Accounts	Number of financial accounts	Count of rows from the Financial Account object.
Win Rate	Indicates the total won opportunities closed in the selected date range.	Sum of all won opportunities that are closed in the selected date range.
